Nightshift could barely move in the state he was in.  He looks to Wolfgang =
and the others with a painful expression on his face.

" Sorry guys but, no=
 go.  I can't move without feel'n like I'm be'n tortured by Hydras himself.=
  The sooner I trade in this body for a new one, the better I'll be.  I pro=
mise, I'll move much better when I get upgraded."

Perpetually on the move =
and constantly busy. 

On Oct 3, 2011, at 12:31 PM, Super Cyclonus <supercy=
clonus@...> wrote:

> > <OLD>
> >
> > Nightshift chuckles.
> >
> > " =
It's all good, the only moves I was talk'n about were on the dance floor.
>=
 > I would'nt do any harm ta a fellow comrade. As a matter of fact, when
> =
> things calm down and we get home, I'd like Wolfgang ta join me for some f=
un
> > at the Blue Diode, if it's still there. Actually I hope we can all m=
eet up
> > there for some fun. Primus knows we could use a good time."
> 
>=
 <NEW>
> 
> RAMULUS chuckled, "With Wolfgang's dance moves, you might be be=
tter
> off in battle. Atleast there he will be aimed at the enemy!"
> 
> Th=
ere was a good natured bump from WOLFGANG on RAMULUS, "Just you
> wait, you=
'll see."
> 
> SANTON just kept poiinting them back towards the med bay.
> =

> (TAG)
> 
> Preston
>
